About the Company: Filtra Consultants and Engineers Ltd. is engaged in supplying water treatment plant components to original equipment manufacturer. It offers multiport valves, electronic dosing pumps, pressure vessels, rotameters, intisoft automatic softeners, kit for reverse osmosis (RO) plants, high pressure pumps and rotameters. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Mumbai, Maharashtra.
